assets.title: Main File for Game Development on Embedded Systems

annotations.text: This code snippet is a program that initializes the hardware, start screen, play game, and handle firing. It also includes functions to initialize their boards with interrupts for Peter Sutton, Luke Kamols, Jarrod Bennett

assets.title: Find key
assets.raw: const findKey = (obj: any, fn: Function) => Object.keys(obj).find((key) => fn(obj[key], key, obj));

assets.title: Count occurrences
assets.raw: const countOccurrences = (arr, val) => arr.reduce((a, v) => (v === val ? a + 1 : a), 0);

assets.title: Check for duplicates
assets.raw:
def check_for_duplicates(input):
    return len(input) != len(set(input))

annotations.text:
Checks whether a list has duplicate values by using set to grab only unique elements. From The Pieces Python Collection.

assets.title: Remove falsy
assets.raw:
def remove_falsy(unfiltered_list):
    return list(filter(bool, unfiltered_list))

annotations.text: This code relates to python, pieces python collection, list and remove falsy
